GE07bhg4c07u:265: madhusūdanaḥ - evaṃ kṣetra-lakṣaṇāyāḥ prakṛter aparatvaṃ vadan
GE07bhg4c07u:266: kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇāṃ parāṃ prakṛtim āha apareyam iti |
GE07bhg4c07u:267: yā prāg aṣṭadhoktā prakṛtiḥ sarvācetana-varga-rūpā seyam aparā nikṛṣṭā jaḍatvāt parārthatvāt saṃsāra-bandha-rūpatvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c07u:269: kṣetra-lakṣaṇāyāḥ prakṛter anyāṃ vilakṣaṇāṃ tu-śabdād yathā-kathaṃcid apy abhedāyogyāṃ jīva-bhūtāṃ cetanātmikāṃ kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇāṃ me mamātma-bhūtāṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:270: viśuddhāṃ parāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi he mahābāho, yayā
GE07bhg4c07u:272: jagad-acetana-jātaṃ dhāryate svato viśīrya uttamyate anena jīvenātmanānupraviśa nāma-rūpe vyākaravāṇi iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:275: viśvanāthaḥ - iyaṃ prakṛtir variyaṅgākhyā śaktir aparānutkṛṣṭā jaḍatvāt |
GE07bhg4c07u:276: ito 'nyāṃ prakṛtiṃ taṭasthāṃ śaktiṃ jīva-bhūtāṃ parām utkṛṣṭāṃ viddhi
GE07bhg4c07u:278: asyā utkṛṣṭatve hetuḥ yayā cetanayedaṃ jagad acetanaṃ svabhogārthaṃ gṛhyate ||5||
GE07bhg4c07u:279: baladevaḥ - eṣā prakṛtir aparā nikṛṣṭā jaḍatvād bhogyatvāc ceto jaḍāyāḥ prakṛter anyāṃ parāṃ cetanatvād bhoktṛtvāc cotkṛṣṭāṃ jīva-bhūtāṃ me madīyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c07u:280: he mahābāho pārtha ! paratve hetuḥ yayeti |
GE07bhg4c07u:281: yayā cetanayā idaṃ jagat sva-karma-dvārā dhāryate śayyāsanādivat sva-bhogāya
GE07bhg4c07u:283: śrutiś ca harer eveyaṃ śaktis tvayīty āha
GE07bhg4c07u:287: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā ||6||
GE07bhg4c07u:288: śrīdharaḥ - anayoḥ prakṛtitvaṃ darśayan svasya tad-dvārā
GE07bhg4c07u:290: ete kṣetra-kṣetrajña-rūpe prakṛtī yonī kāraṇa-bhūte yeṣāṃ tāny etad-yonīni |
GE07bhg4c07u:294: cetanā tu mad-aṃśa-bhūtā bhoktṛtvena deheṣu praviśya
GE07bhg4c07u:296: te ca madīye prakṛtī mattaḥ sambhūte |
GE07bhg4c07u:303: madhusūdanaḥ - ukta-prakṛti-dvaye kārya-liṅgakam anumānaṃ pramāṇayan svasya tad-dvārā jaga-sṛṣṭy-ādi-kāraṇatvaṃ darśayati etad-yonīnīti |
GE07bhg4c07u:304_0: ete aparatvena paratvena ca prāg-ukte kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇe prakṛtī yonir yeṣāṃ tāny etad-yonīni bhūtāni bhavana-dharmakāṇi
GE07bhg4c07u:304_1: sarvāṇi cetanācetanātmakāni janimanti nikhilānīty evam upadhāraya jānīhi |
GE07bhg4c07u:307: evaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇe mamopādhi-bhūte yataḥ prakṛtī bhavatas tatas tad-dvārāhaṃ sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaro 'nanta-śakti-māyopādhiḥ kṛtsnasya carācarātmakasya jagataḥ sarvasya
GE07bhg4c07u:308: kārya-vargasya prabhava utpatti-kāraṇaṃ pralayas tathā vināśa-kāraṇam |
GE07bhg4c07u:309: svāpnikasyeva prapañcasya māyikasya māyāśarayatva-viṣayatvābhyāṃ māyāvy aham evopādānaṃ draṣṭā cety arthaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c07u:310: viśvanāthaḥ - etac chakti-dvaya-dvāraiva svasya jagat-kāraṇatvam āha etad iti |
GE07bhg4c07u:313: ataḥ kṛtsnasya sarvasyāsya jagataḥ prabhavo mac-chakti-dvaya-prabhūtatvād aham eva sraṣṭā
GE07bhg4c07u:314: | pralayas tac-chaktimati mayy eva pralīna-bhāvitvād aham evāsya saṃhartā
GE07bhg4c07u:315: baladevaḥ -- etac chakti-dvaya-dvāraiva sarva-jagat-kāraṇatāṃ svasyāha etad iti |
GE07bhg4c07u:316: sarvāṇi sthira-carāṇi bhūtāny etad-yonīni upadhāraya viddhi |
GE07bhg4c07u:319: te ca prakṛtī madīye matta eva sambhūte |
GE07bhg4c07u:320: ataḥ kṛtsnasya sa-prakṛtikasya jagato 'ham eva prabhava utpatti-hetuḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:322: tasya pralaya-saṃhartāpy aham eva pralīyate 'nena iti vyutpatteḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c07u:324: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiñcid asti dhanañjaya |
GE07bhg4c07u:325: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇi-gaṇā iva ||7||
GE07bhg4c07u:326: śrīdharaḥ - yasmād evaṃ tasmāt matta iti |
GE07bhg4c07u:327: mattaḥ sakāśāt parataraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jagataḥ sṛṣṭi-saṃhārayoḥ svatantraṃ kāraṇaṃ kiñcid api nāsti
GE07bhg4c07u:328: sthiti-hetur apy aham evety āha mayīti |
GE07bhg4c07u:329: mayi sarvam idaṃ jagat protaṃ grathitam āśritam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:331: madhusūdanaḥ - yasmād aham eva māyayā sarvasya jagato
GE07bhg4c07u:335_0: paramārtha-satyāt svapna-dṛśa iva svāpnikaṃ māyāvina iva māyikaṃ śukti-śakalāvacchinna-caitanyādivat-tad-ajñāna-kalpitaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:335_1: rajataṃ parataraṃ paramārtha-satyam anyat kiṃcid api nāsti he dhanañjaya |
GE07bhg4c07u:336: mayi kalpitaṃ paramārthato na matto bhidyata ity arthaḥ tad ananyatvam ārambhaṇa-śabdādibhyaḥ [Vs 2.1.14] iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c07u:337: vyavahāra-dṛṣṭyā tu mayi sad-rūpe sphuraṇa-rūpe ca sarvam idaṃ jaḍa-jātaṃ protaṃ grathitaṃ mat-sattayā sad iva mat-sphuraṇena ca sphurad iva vyavahārāya māyā-mayāya
GE07bhg4c07u:341: athavā sūtre taijasātmani hiraṇyagarbhe svapna-dṛśi svapna-protā
GE07bhg4c07u:343: anye tu param ataḥ setūn māna-sambandha-bheda-vyapadeśebhyaḥ [Vs 3.2.31]
GE07bhg4c07u:344: iti sūtroktasya pūrva-pakṣasyottaratvena ślokam imaṃ vyācakṣate |
GE07bhg4c07u:345: mattaḥ sarvajñāt sarva-śakteḥ sarva-kāraṇāt parataraṃ praśasyataraṃ sarvasya
GE07bhg4c07u:346: jagataḥ sṛṣṭi-saṃhārayoḥ svatantraṃ kāraṇam anyan nāsti he dhanañjaya !
GE07bhg4c07u:347: yasmād evaṃ tasmān mayi sarva-kāraṇe sarvam idaṃ kārya-jātaṃ protaṃ grathitaṃ nānyan na |
GE07bhg4c07u:348: sūtre maṇi-gaṇā iveti dṛṣṭāntas tu grathitatva-mātre
GE07bhg4c07u:350: kanake kuṇḍalādivad iti tu yogyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c07u:351: viśvanāthaḥ -- yasmād evaṃ tasmād aham eva sarvam ity āha mattaḥ parataram anyat kiñcid apii nāsti |
GE07bhg4c07u:353: tathā ca śrutiḥ ekam evādvitīyaṃ brahma, neha nānāsti kiñcana iti |
GE07bhg4c07u:354: evaṃ svasya sarvātmakatvam uktvā sarvāntaryāmitvaṃ cāha mayīti |
GE07bhg4c07u:355: sarvam idaṃ cij-jaḍātmakaṃ jagat mat-kāryatvān mad-ātmakam api punar mayy
GE07bhg4c07u:356: antaryāmiṇi protaṃ grathitaṃ yathā sūtre maṇi-gaṇāḥ protāḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:357: madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādās tu sūtre maṇi-gaṇā iveti dṛṣṭāntas tu
GE07bhg4c07u:358: grathitatva-mātre, na tu kāraṇatve kanake kuṇḍalādivad iti tu yogyo dṛṣṭānta ity āhuḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c07u:359: baladevaḥ - nanu sthira-carayor apara-parayoḥ prakṛtyor api tvam eva
GE07bhg4c07u:360: tac-chaktimān yonir ity ukter nikhila-jagad-bījatvaṃ tava pratītaṃ, na tu sarva-paratvam
GE07bhg4c07u:362: tato yad uttarataraṃ tad arūpam anāmayam |
GE07bhg4c07u:363: ya etad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti athetare duḥkham evāpi yanti || [ŚvetU 3.10] iti śravaṇād iti cet tatrāha matta iti
GE07bhg4c07u:364: mattas tvat-sakhāt kṛṣṇāt parataraḥ śreṣṭham anyat kiñcid api nāsty aham eva sarva-śreṣṭhaṃ vastv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:365: nanu tato yad uttarataram ity ādāv anyathā śrutim iti cen mandam etat kṣodākṣamatvāt |
GE07bhg4c07u:366: tathā hi vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam
GE07bhg4c07u:368: tam eva vidvān amṛta iha bhavati nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'nayanāya || iti [ŚvetU 3.8]
GE07bhg4c07u:369: śvetāśvataraiḥ sarva-jagad-bījasya mahā-puruṣasya viṣṇor jñānam amṛtasya
GE07bhg4c07u:371: yasmāt paraṃ nāparam asti kiñcid yasmān nāṇīyona jyāyo 'sti kiñcit iti tasyaiva paramatvaṃ tad-itarasya tad-asambhavaṃ ca pratipādya |
GE07bhg4c07u:372: tato yad uttarotaraṃ ity ādinā pūrvoktam eva nigamitam |
GE07bhg4c07u:377: mad-anyasya kasyacid api śraiṣṭhyābhāvād aham eva mad-anya-sarvāśraya ity āha mayīti |
GE07bhg4c07u:382: praṇavaḥ sarva-vedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu ||8||
GE07bhg4c07u:383: śrīdharaḥ - jagataḥ sthiti-hetutvam eva prapañcati raso 'ham iti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:388: prakāśa-rūpayā vibhūtyā tad-āśrayatvena sthito 'ham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:395: madhusūdanaḥ - avādīnāṃ rasādiṣu protatva-pratīteḥ kathaṃ tvayi sarvam
GE07bhg4c07u:396: idaṃ protam iti ca na śaṅkyaṃ rasādi-rūpeṇa mamaiva sthitatvād ity āha raso 'ham iti pañcabhiḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:397: rasaḥ puṇyo madhuras tan-mātra-rūpaḥ sarvāsām apāṃ sāraḥ kāraṇa-bhūto yo 'psu sarvāsvanugataḥ so 'haṃ he kaunteya tad-rūpe mayi sarvā āpaḥ protā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:400: tathā porabhā prakāśaḥ śaśi-sūryayor aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c07u:404: anusyūto 'haṃ tad yathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi parṇāni saṃtṛṇṇāny evam oṅkāreṇa sarvā vāk iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:406: sarvā vāk sarvo veda ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:409: puruṣatva-sāmānyaṃ nṛṣu puruṣeṣu yad anusyūtaṃ tad aham |
GE07bhg4c07u:411: mayi sarve viśeṣāḥ protāḥ śrautair dundubhy-ādi-dṛṣṭāntair iti sarvatra draṣṭavyam ||8||
GE07bhg4c07u:412: viśvanāthaḥ - sva-kārye jagaty atra yathāham antaryāmi-rūpeṇa praviṣṭo
GE07bhg4c07u:413: varte, tathā kvacit kāraṇa-rūpeṇa kvacit kāryeṣu manuṣyādiṣu sāra-rūpeṇāpy
GE07bhg4c07u:414: ahaṃ varta ity āha raso 'ham iti caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:421: nṛṣu pauruṣam sakala udyama-viśeṣa eva manuṣya-sāraḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c07u:422: baladevaḥ - tattvaṃ darśayati raso 'ham iti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:424: rasa-tan-mātrayā vibhūtyā tāḥ pālayan tāsv ahaṃ vartate |
GE07bhg4c07u:426: śaśini sūrye cāhaṃ prabhāsmi prabhayā vibhūtyā tau pālayan tayor ahaṃ varte |
GE07bhg4c07u:434: puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau |
GE07bhg4c07u:440: vivakṣitatvāt surabhi-gandhasyaivotkṛṣṭatayā vibhūtitvāt puṇyo gandha ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c07u:441: tathā vibhāvasāgnau yat tejo duḥsahā sahajā dīptis tad aham |
GE07bhg4c07u:442: sarva-bhūteṣu jīvanaṃ prāṇa-dhāraṇa-vāyur aham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:444: madhusūdanaḥ - puṇyaḥ surabhir avikṛto gandhaḥ sarva-pṛthivī-sāmānya-rūpas
GE07bhg4c07u:447: śabda-sparśa-rūpa-rasa-gandhānāṃ hi svabhāvata eva puṇyatvam avikṛtatvaṃ prāṇinām adharma-viśeṣāt tu teṣām apuṇyatvaṃ na tu svabhāvata iti draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c07u:448: tathā vibhāvasāv agnau yat tejaḥ sarva-dahana-prakāśana-sāmarthya-rūpam uṣṇa-sparśa-sahitaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:451: āpyāyakaḥ śīta-sparśaḥ so 'py aham iti draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c07u:452: sarva-bhūteṣu sarveṣu prāṇiṣu jīvanaṃ prāṇa-dhāraṇam āyur aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c07u:453: tad-rūpe mayi sarve prāṇinaḥ protā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:454: tapasviṣu nityaṃ tapo-yukteṣu vānaprasthādiṣu yat tapaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:456: tad-rūpe mayi tapasvinaḥ protā viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c07u:457: tapaś ceti ca-kāreṇa cittaikāgryam āntaraṃ jihvopasthādi-nigraha-lakṣaṇaṃ bāhyaṃ ca sarvaṃ tapaḥ samuccīyate ||9||
GE07bhg4c07u:458: viśvanāthaḥ -- puṇyo 'vikṛto gandhaḥ puṇyas tu cārv api ity amaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:467: sarva-vastu-pacana-prakāśanādi-sāmarthya-rūpaṃ ca śadād vāyau yaḥ puṇyaḥ sparśa uṣṇa-sparśa-vyākulānām āpāyakaḥ so 'ham iti bodhyam |
GE07bhg4c07u:470: bījaṃ māṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam |
GE07bhg4c07u:471: buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham ||10||
GE07bhg4c07u:480: madhusūdanaḥ - sarvāṇi bhūtāni sva-sva-bījeṣu protāni na tu svayīti cen nety āha bījam iti |
GE07bhg4c07u:481: yat sarva-bhūtānāṃ sthāvara-jaṅgamānām ekaṃ bījaṃ kāraṇaṃ |
GE07bhg4c07u:482: sanātanaṃ nityaṃ bījāntarānapekṣaṃ na tu prativyakti-bhinnam
GE07bhg4c07u:483: anityaṃ vā tad-avyākṛtākhyaṃ sarva-bījaṃ mām eva viddhi na tu mad-bhinnaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:485: ato yuktam ekasminn eva mayi sarva-bīje protatvaṃ sarveṣām ity
GE07bhg4c07u:489: buddhi-rūpe mayi buddhimantaḥ protā viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhāvasyoktatvāt |
GE07bhg4c07u:491: pariś cānabhibhāvyatvaṃ tejasvināṃ tathāvidha-prāgalbhya-yuktānāṃ yat tad aham asmi, tejo-rūpe mayi tejasvinaḥ protā ity arthaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c07u:492: viśvanāthaḥ - bījam avikṛtaṃ kāraṇaṃ pradhānākhyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:493: sanātanaṃ nityaṃ buddhimatāṃ buddhir eva sāraḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c07u:494_0: baladevaḥ - sarva-bhūtānāṃ carācarāṇāṃ yad eka-bījaṃ sanātanaṃ nityaṃ, na tu prativyakti-bhinnam anityaṃ vā tat pradhānākhyaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:494_1: sarva-bījaṃ mām eva viddhi tad-rūpayā vibhūtyā tāny ahaṃ pālayāmi tat-pareṇa hi tāni puṣyante
GE07bhg4c07u:503: rāgaḥ punar abhilaṣite 'rthe prāpte 'pi punar adhike 'rthe
GE07bhg4c07u:505: tābhyāṃ vivarjitaṃ balavatāṃ balam aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c07u:509: madhusūdanaḥ - aprāpto viṣayaḥ prāpti-kāraṇābhāve 'pi prāpyatām ity ākāraś
GE07bhg4c07u:511: prāpto viṣayaḥ kṣaya-kāraṇe saty api na
GE07bhg4c07u:512: kṣīyatām ity evam-ākāraś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣo rañjanātmā rāgas tābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:513_0: viśeṣeṇa varjitaṃ sarvathā tad-akāraṇaṃ rajas-tamo-virahitaṃ yat svadharmānuṣṭhānāya dehendriyādi-dhāraṇa-sāmarthyaṃ sāttvikaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:513_1: balam balavatāṃ tādṛśa-sāttvika-bala-yuktānāṃ saṃsāra-parāṅmukhānāṃ tad aham asmi |
GE07bhg4c07u:514: tad-rūpe mayi balavantaḥ protā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:517: kāma-rāga-vivarjitam eva balaṃ mad-rūpatvena dhyeyaṃ na tu
GE07bhg4c07u:521: 'pratiṣiddho dharmānukūlo vā yo bhūteṣu prāṇiṣu kāmaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:533: tābhyāṃ vivarjitaṃ balaṃ sva-dharmānuṣṭhāna-sāmarthyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:536: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye |
GE07bhg4c07u:537: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi ||12||
GE07bhg4c07u:543: prāṇināṃ sva-karma-vaśāj jāyante tān matta eva jātān iti viddhi |
GE07bhg4c07u:545: evam api teṣv ahaṃ na varte |
GE07bhg4c07u:548: te tu mad-adhīnāḥ santo mayi vartanta ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c07u:549: madhusūdanaḥ - kim evaṃ parigaṇanena ye caiveti |
GE07bhg4c07u:553: ye ca tāmasāḥ śoka-mohādayaḥ prāṇinām avidyā-karmādi-vaśāj jāyante tān matta eva jāyamānān iti ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhava ity
GE07bhg4c07u:555: athavā sāttvikā rājasās tāmasāś ca bhāvāḥ sarve 'pi jaḍa-vargā vyākhyeyā viśeṣa-hetv-abhāvāt
GE07bhg4c07u:558: evam api na tv ahaṃ teṣu, matto jātatve 'pi
GE07bhg4c07u:561: te tu bhāvā mayi rajjvām iva sarpādayaḥ kalpitā mad-adhīna-sattā-sphūrtikā mad-adhīnā ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c07u:562: viśvanāthaḥ - evaṃ vastu-kāraṇa-bhūtā vastu-sāra-bhūtāś ca rākṣasādyāś ca
GE07bhg4c07u:566: vastu-mātram eva mad-vibhūtir ity āha ye caiveti |

GE07bhg4c07u:1429: viśvanāthaḥ - tan-māyayā jīvāḥ kadārabhya muhyantīty apekṣāyām āha iccheti
GE07bhg4c07u:1430: | sarge jagat-sṛṣṭy-ārambha-kāle sarva-bhūtāni sarve jīvāḥ sammohayanti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1431: kena ? prācīna-karmodbuddhau yāv icchā-dveṣau indriyāṇām anukūle viṣaye
GE07bhg4c07u:1432_0: icchābhilāṣaḥ pratikūle dveṣaḥ tābhyāṃ samutthaḥ samudbhūto yo dvandvo mānāpamānayoḥ śītoṣṇādyāḥ sukha-duḥkhayoḥ strī-puṃsayor
GE07bhg4c07u:1432_1: mohaḥ - ahaṃ sammānitaḥ sukhī, aham avamānito duḥkhī |
GE07bhg4c07u:1433: mameyaṃ strī, mamāyaṃ purusaḥ ity ādyākāraka āvidyako yo mohas tena saṃmohaṃ strī-putrādiṣv
GE07bhg4c07u:1437: yadṛcchayā mat-kathādau jāta-śraddhas tu yaḥ pumān |
GE07bhg4c07u:1438: na nirviṇṇo nāti-sakto bhakti-yogo 'sya siddhi-daḥ || [BhP 11.20.8] iti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1439: baladevaḥ - tvaj-jñānī kutaḥ sudurlabhas tatrāha iccheti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1443_0: mānāpamānayoḥ sukha-duḥkhayoḥ strī-puruṣayor dvandvair yo mohaḥ sat-kṛto 'haṃ sukhī syām asat-kṛtas tu duḥkhī mameyaṃ patnī
GE07bhg4c07u:1443_1: mamāyaṃ patir ity evam abhiniveśa-lakṣaṇas tenety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1444: kīdṛśenety āha iccheti pūrva-janmani yatra yatra yāv icchā-dveṣāv abhūtāṃ tābhyāṃ saṃskārātmanā sthitābhyāṃ samuttiṣṭhati para-janmani tatra tatrotpadyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1449: yeṣāṃ tv anta-gataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇya-karmaṇām |
GE07bhg4c07u:1451: śrīdharaḥ - kutas tarhi kecana tvāṃ bhajanto dṛśyante ? tatrāha yeṣām iti
GE07bhg4c07u:1452: | yeṣāṃ tu puṇya-caraṇa-śīlānāṃ sarva-pratibandhakaṃ pāpam anta-gataṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1453: naṣṭaṃ te dvandva-nimittena mohena nirmuktā dṛḍha-vratā ekāntinaḥ santo bhajante ||28||
GE07bhg4c07u:1454: madhusūdanaḥ - yadi sarva-bhūtāni saṃmohaṃ yānti, kathaṃ tarhi catur-vidhā
GE07bhg4c07u:1455: bhajante mām ity uktam ? satyaṃ, sukṛtātiśayena teṣāṃ kṣīṇa-pāpatvād ity āha yeṣām iti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1457: puṇya-karmaṇām aneka-janmasu puṇyācaraṇa-śīlānāṃ tais taiḥ puṇyaiḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:1458: karmabhir jñāna-pratibandhakaṃ pāpam antagatam antam avasānaṃ prāptaṃ te
GE07bhg4c07u:1461: āvṛtty-ayogyatvena tyaktā dṛḍha-vratā acālya-saṃkalpāḥ sarvathā bhagavān eva bhajnīyaḥ sa caivaṃ-rūpa eveti
GE07bhg4c07u:1463: bhajante 'nanya-śaraṇāḥ santaḥ sevante etādṛśā eva catur-vidhā bhajante māṃ ity atra sukṛti-śabdenoktāḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:1465: teṣāṃ madhye ye sukṛtinas te saṃmoha-śūnyā māṃ bhajanta ity
GE07bhg4c07u:1467: ayam evotsargaḥ prāg api pratipāditas tribhir guṇamayair bhāvair ity atra |
GE07bhg4c07u:1470: viśvanāthaḥ -- tarhi keṣāṃ bhaktāv adhikāra ity ata āha yeṣāṃ puṇya-karmaṇāṃ pāpaṃ tvaṃ tu gatam anta-kālaṃ prāntaṃ naśyad-avasthaṃ, na tu samyak naṣṭam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1475: ye tu bhajanādy-abhyāsataḥ samyak naṣṭa-pāpās te mohena niḥśeṣeṇa muktā
GE07bhg4c07u:1482: kevala-bhakti-yogasya puṇyādi-karmāśrayaṃ naiva kāraṇam iti bahuśaḥ pratipādanāt ||28||
GE07bhg4c07u:1483: baladevaḥ - nanu keṣāṃcit tvad-bhaktiḥ pratīyate sā na syāt |
GE07bhg4c07u:1484: sarva-bhūtāni sarge saṃmohaṃ yāntīty ukter iti cet tatrāha yeṣāṃ prāṇināṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1485: yādṛcchika-mahattama-dṛṣṭi-pātāt pāpam anta-gataṃ nāśaṃ prāptam abhūt
GE07bhg4c07u:1486: viṣṇor bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ pāvanāya caranti hi [BhP 11.2.28] iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1489: yeṣāṃ puṇyaṃ tu cārv api ity amaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1491: mahat-prasaṅga-prāpta-niṣṭhā dvandva-mohena nirmuktā mat-tattva-jñāḥ santo māṃ bhajante ||28||
GE07bhg4c07u:1494: te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam ||29||
GE07bhg4c07u:1495: śrīdharaḥ - evaṃ ca māṃ bhajantaḥ sarvaṃ vijñeyaṃ vijñāya kṛtārthāḥ bhavantīty āha jareti
GE07bhg4c07u:1496: jarāmaraṇayor mokṣāya nirasanārthaṃ mām āśritya ye prayatante te tat paraṃ brahma viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1498: yena tat prāptavyaṃ taṃ dehādi-vyatiriktaṃ śuddham ātmānaṃ ca jānantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1499: tat-sādhana-bhūtam akhilaṃ sa-rahasyaṃ karma ca jānantīty arthaḥ ||29||
GE07bhg4c07u:1500: madhusūdanaḥ - athedānīm arjunasya praśyan utthāpayituṃ sūtra-bhūtau
GE07bhg4c07u:1502: anayor eva vṛtti-sthānīya uttaro 'dhyāyo bhaviṣyati jareti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1505: sa-guṇaṃ bhagavantam āśrityetara-sarva-vaimukhyena śaraṇaṃ gatvā yatanti
GE07bhg4c07u:1506_0: yatante mad-arpitāni phalābhisandhi-śūnyāni vihitāni karmāṇi kurvanti te krameṇa śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇāḥ santas taj-jagat-kāraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1506_1: māyādhiṣṭhānaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ brahma nirguṇaṃ tat-pada-lakṣyaṃ māṃ viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1509: viśvanāthaḥ - tad evam ārtādyās trayaḥ sakāmā māṃ bhajantaḥ kṛtārthā bhavantīti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1510: devatāntaraṃ bhajantas tu cyavanta ity uktvā svasyābhajane
GE07bhg4c07u:1514: jarāmaraṇayor mokṣāya nāśāya ye yogino yatanti yatante |
GE07bhg4c07u:1516: te taṃ prasiddhaṃ brahma tathā kṛtsnam ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya bhoktṛtayā vartamānam adhyātmaṃ jīvātmānam akhilaṃ karma ca nānā-vidha-karma-janyaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1517: jīvasya saṃsāraṃ ca mad-bhakti-prabhāvād eva vidur jānanti ||29||
GE07bhg4c07u:1518: baladevaḥ -- tad evam ārtādayaḥ sa-kāmā mad-bhaktāḥ kāmān anubhūyānte māṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1519: prapadya vindanti mad-anya-deva-bhaktās tu saṃsarantīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c07u:1520: atha tebhyo 'nyo 'pi sa-kāmo mad-bhakto 'stīty ucyate jareti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1522: jarā-maraṇābhyāṃ vimokṣāya tan-mātra-kāmāḥ santo mām āśritya mad-arcāṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1525: te tat prasiddhaṃ brahma kṛtsnaṃ sa-parikaraṃ vidur adhyātmaṃ cākhilaṃ karma ca viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1529: labhante, na tu mad-vaśyatā-karīṃ mat-priyatām ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1530: smṛtiś caivam āha sakṛd yad aṅga pratmānta-rahitā mona-mayīṃ bhāgavatīṃ dadau gatim ity ādyā
GE07bhg4c07u:1532: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c07u:1533: prayāṇa-kāle 'pi ca māṃ te vidur yukta-cetasaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c07u:1534: śrīdharaḥ - na caivaṃ-bhūtānāṃ yoga-bhraṃśa-śaṅkāpīty āha sādhibhūteti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1536: adhibhūtenādhidaivena ca sahādhiyajñena ca saha māṃ ye jānanti te
GE07bhg4c07u:1537: yukta-cetaso mayy āsakta-manasaḥ prayāṇa-kāle 'pi maraṇa-samaye 'pi māṃ vidur jānanti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1538: na tu tad api vyākulībhūya māṃ vismaranti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1546_0: vivaśa-karaṇatayā mad-vismaraṇaṃ śaṅkanīyaṃ, yataḥ sādhibhūtādhidaivam adhibhūtādidaivābhyāṃ sahitaṃ tathā sādhiyajñaṃ cādhiyajñena
GE07bhg4c07u:1546_1: ca sahitaṃ māṃ ye viduś cintayanti te yukta-cetasaḥ sarvadā mayi samāhita-cetasaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:1557: tad atrottamādhikāriṇaṃ prati jñeyaṃ madhyamādhikāriṇaṃ prati ca dhyeyaṃ lakṣaṇayā mukhyayā ca vṛttyā
GE07bhg4c07u:1563: viśvanāthaḥ --- mad-bhakti-prabhāvād yeṣām īdṛśaṃ maj-jñānaṃ syāt teṣām anta-kāle 'pi tad eva jñānaṃ syāt |
GE07bhg4c07u:1564: na tv anyeṣām iva karmopasthāpitā bhāvi-deha-prāpty-anurūpā matir ity āha sādhibhūteti
GE07bhg4c07u:1567: bhaktā eva hares tattva-vido māyāṃ taranti,
GE07bhg4c07u:1568: te coktāḥ ṣaḍ-vidhā atrety adhyāyārtho nirūpitaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c07u:1571: baladevaḥ - na ca tat-sevayā prāptaṃ taj-jñānaṃ kadācid api bhraṃśety āha sādhīti |
GE07bhg4c07u:1572: adhibhūtenādhidaivenādhiyajñena ca sahitaṃ māṃ ye viduḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:1573: sat-prasaṅgāj jānanti, te prayāṇa-kāle mṛtyu-samaye 'pi māṃ vidur na tu
GE07bhg4c07u:1574: tad-anyavad vyagrāḥ santo māṃ vismarantīty arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c07u:1575: māṃ vidus tattvato bhaktā man-māyām uttaranti te |
GE07bhg4c07u:1576: te punaḥ pañcadhety eṣa saptamasya vinirṇayaḥ ||
